name: AdSignalPro
author: WapiWP

sections.description:
AdSignalPro: Guard your WordPress site with AdSignalPro! Defend against AdWords click attacks, thwart login breaches, and receive instant WhatsApp alerts. Stay vigilant against threats and effortlessly monitor visitor comments. Elevate your site’s security and responsiveness!

Third-Party Service Usage

This plugin utilizes a third-party service provided by AdSignalPro under specific circumstances. The service is employed for [analytics, notifications].

For more information about the service, you can visit the AdSignalPro Service link.

Tags: AdWords request notification, WhatsApp lead alerts, comment notification to WhatsApp, login attempt alerts, WordPress login notification, phone notifications, AdSignalPro

Privacy Policy

https://wapiwp.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

Third-Party Service Usage

Please review the [Terms of Service]
https://wapiwp.com/AdSignalProterms.html
SweetAlert2 GitHub
https://github.com/sweetalert2/sweetalert2
sections.installation:
• Go to PLUGINS/ADD NEW and search for AdSignalPro or upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP.
  • Activate the plugin from the Plugins section.
  • Enter your phone number in the “Admin Phone Number” field in the format 9053xxxxxxxxx.
  • To confirm your admin status, click the ‘Verify’ button to send a message via WhatsApp to the provided number. Alternatively, send ‘RegistermyNumber’ to +7977608-67-25 on WhatsApp
sections.faq:
Do I need an API KEY to use the plugin?

Yes, to use the plugin, you’ll need an API KEY. However, you can receive 1,000,000 free notifications.

How can I get an API KEY?

You can register and get your API KEY from https://wapiwp.com/kayit.php

How should the plugin settings be?

You can access the AdSignalPro Options tab in the AdSignalPro screen located in the Wp-admin Panel.
To confirm your admin status, click the ‘Verify’ button to send a message via WhatsApp to the provided number. Alternatively, send ‘RegistermyNumber’ to +7977608-67-25 on WhatsApp

In this section, enter your phone number (including the country code) into the ‘Admin Phone Number’ field. Please do not include symbols such as +. For example: 905310000000.

Click the “Update Options” button and save your settings.
